mapper.update: update commodity set `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, `NAME`, URL, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, `STATUS`, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from commodity where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, `NAME`, URL, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, `STATUS`, UPDATE_USER, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from commodity
